component

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • component.Component
      • component.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TileManager.Crystal, TileManager.GrassTile, TileManager.LockedTile

    public abstract class Tile
extends Component
    A class representing a Tile drawn on the screen.
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

      The index in the neighbors array of the Tile to the right of this one
      protected int stickiness
      How many tiles this one can hold in place to prevent falling
      protected int strength
      How many tiles can be above this one before it collapses and turns into an item -1 if the tile cannot collapse

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture,
            boolean canBreak,
            double breakTime,
            boolean canFall,
            int strength,
            int stickiness)
        Constructs a new Tile with the given states
        Parameters:
        texture - the texture for the display of this tile (Must be 50x50 pixels)
        canBreak - Whether or not this tile can be broken by the user
        breakTime - How long it takes this tile to be broken by the use (in seconds)
        canFall - Whether or not this tile is affected by gravity
        strength - How many tiles can be on top of this one before it breaks (-1 if indestructable)
        stickiness - How many tiles to either side this one can prevent from falling

    • Method Detail

      • onRightClick

        public abstract void onRightClick()
        The behavior of this tile when it is right clicked

      • setNeighbor

        public void setNeighbor(Tile neighbor,
                        int idx)
        Sets a neighbor of this tile using RIGHT, LEFT, TOP, or BOTTOM
        Parameters:
        neighbor - the Tile this will be neighboring
        idx - the index of the neighbors array the new neighbor will occupy

      • removeNeighbor

        public void removeNeighbor(int idx)
        Removes the neighbor at the given index of this Tile
        Parameters:
        idx - RIGHT, LEFT, TOP, or BOTTOM

      • willFall

        public boolean willFall()
        Returns:
        true if this Tile should fall given its state and the state of its neighbors

      • checkSide

        private boolean checkSide(int direction,
                          int stickFactor)
        Checks the side of this Tile to see if it has enough Tiles to its one seide keeping it from falling
        Parameters:
        direction - RIGHT or LEFT,
        stickFactor - How many tiles before this one will fall
        Returns:
        true if this Tile is secure

      • willCollapse

        public boolean willCollapse()
        Returns:
        true if this Tile will collapse given the number of Tiles above it

      • loadGreaterThanStrength

        private boolean loadGreaterThanStrength(int strengthFactor)
        Returns:
        true if the number of Tiles above this Tile is greater than its strength

      • getNeighbor

        public Tile getNeighbor(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - RIGHT, LEFT, TOP, or BOTTOM
        Returns:
        the neighbor at the given index

        public boolean isAccessible()
